q: Page looks on during a product launch last February. Mr. Eric Schmidt has been Google's chief executive since July 2001, when he took over the role from Mr. Page. Mr. Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and new products, the company said. The change was announced as the company reported fourth-quarter profit jumped 29%. The most consistent censure is reserved for Colin Powell , Condoleezza Rice and anyone who operated in their diplomatic orbit. Colin Powell and his supporters, he writes, were skeptical of the administration's initiatives to the point of disloyalty. Apparently, it did not help that Democrats like then-Delaware Joe Biden described Colin Powell to a newspaper reporter as a "good guy,' but Donald Rumsfeld as a` unilateralist.' How Iraq looks 50 years from now will do far more to write the definitive history of President Bush "s decision to go to war in Iraq than will any of the memoirs from the various players.

the Giants, a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. " Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
